verses.verse: בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> be-'es-Rim and twentieth וְחָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> ve-cha-Mesh In the five שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year לְ֠גָלוּתֵנוּ <WH1546> Le-ga-lu-te-nu of our captivity בְּרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> be-Rosh in the beginning הַשָּׁנָ֜ה <WH8141> hash-sha-Nah of the year בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <WH6218> be-'a-Sor in the tenth לַחֹ֗דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh, [day] of the month בְּאַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> be-'ar-Ba' four עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, year אַחַ֕ר <WH310> 'a-Char after אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after הֻכְּתָ֖ה <WH5221> huk-ke-Tah was smitten הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir; that the city בְּעֶ֣צֶם׀ <WH6106> be-'E-tzem in the selfsame הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom day הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, he הָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> ha-ye-Tah become עָלַי֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lai and יַד־ <WH3027> yad- the hand יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve was upon me and brought אֹתִ֖י <WH853> 'o-Ti שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> Sham-mah. there

וַיָּבֵ֨יא <WH935> vai-ya-Vei And he brought אוֹתִ֜י <WH853> o-Ti שָׁ֗מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah, there וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> ve-hin-neh- and behold אִישׁ֙ <WH376> 'ish me thither and behold [there was] a man מַרְאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH4758> mar-'E-hu whose appearance כְּמַרְאֵ֣ה <WH4758> ke-mar-'Eh [was] like the appearance נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet, of brass וּפְתִיל־ <WH6616> u-fe-til- with a line פִּשְׁתִּ֥ים <WH6593> pish-Tim of flax בְּיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> be-ya-Do in his hand וּקְנֵ֣ה <WH7070> u-ke-Neh reed הַמִּדָּ֑ה <WH4060> ham-mid-Dah; and a measuring וְה֥וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu and he עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> 'o-Med and he stood בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> bash-Sha-'ar. in the gate

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber said אֵלַ֜י <WH413> 'e-Lai about הָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish, And the man בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- unto me Son אָדָ֡ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man רְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> re-'Eh behold בְעֵינֶיךָ֩ <WH5869> ve-'ei-nei-Cha with thine eyes וּבְאָזְנֶ֨יךָ <WH241> u-ve-'a-ze-Nei-cha with thine ears שְּׁמָ֜ע <WH8085> she-Ma' and hear וְשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> ve-Sim and set לִבְּךָ֗ <WH3820> lib-be-Cha, thine heart לְכֹ֤ל <WH3605> le-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- that אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni I am מַרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> mar-'Eh upon all that I shall shew אוֹתָ֔ךְ <WH853> o-Tach, כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki in לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an thee for to the intent הַרְאוֹתְכָ֖ה <WH7200> har-'ot-Chah that I might shew הֻבָ֣אתָה <WH935> hu-Va-tah [them] unto thee [art] thou brought הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> Hen-nah; here הַגֵּ֛ד <WH5046> hag-Ged hither declare אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you רֹאֶ֖ה <WH7200> ro-'Eh all that thou seest לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> le-Veit to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel
